item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Bathroom supplies wholesaler and retailer – Cin7 Implemented Cin7 to manage stock, sales orders and purchase orders. Included Warehouse management system was not up to par with what we had been sold on (no returns function, limited information about products, no way to print packing slips, no way to print labels – natively from the WMS itself). Built a custom dashboard using Python (flask) and the Cin7 API. Made API calls for Sales Orders, Purchase Orders and Credit Notes (returns), then displayed these on an HTML dashboard (bootstrap).

item.title: Using Next Gen AI
